briefdescription.para: Enum to force value type of a parameter.
Constructor with number of nodes and connectivity.

parameterdescription.para: nodeCount Number of nodes to make

memberdef.argsstring: (int nodeCount, int connectivity, const spacial::Point bounding_box)
memberdef.name: Cluster

parameterdescription.para: connectivity The number of connections between each node

memberdef.definition: const std::map< boost::uuids::uuid, boost::shared_ptr< components::Node > > & cryomesh::structures::Cluster::getNodes
memberdef.name: getNodes

simplesect.para: std::map<boost::uuids::uuid, boost::shared_ptr< components::Node > > Return all nodes
std::map<boost::uuids::uuid, boost::shared_ptr< components::Connection > > Return all Connections

briefdescription.para: Get the connector for this Cluster.

simplesect.para: common::Connector<Cluster, Fibre> The connector for this Cluster

briefdescription.para: Get the mutable connector for this Cluster.

simplesect.para: common::Connector<Cluster, Fibre> The mutable onnector for this Cluster

briefdescription.para: Get the NodeMap for this Cluster.

simplesect.para: components::NodeMap The NodeMap for this Cluster

briefdescription.para: Get the mutable NodeMap for this Cluster.

simplesect.para: components::NodeMap The mutable NodeMap for this Cluster

briefdescription.para: Get the total fired nodes in this cluster currently.

parameterdescription.para: Set >0 for only positive triggered nodes, <0 for negative, 0 for all (default)

simplesect.para: int The total count of currently triggered nodes

briefdescription.para: Get the total active nodes in this cluster currently.

parameterdescription.para: Set >0 for only positive active nodes, <0 for negative, 0 for all (default)

simplesect.para: int The total count of currently active nodes

briefdescription.para: Get the total live nodes in this cluster currently, ie those with at least one impulse.

simplesect.para: int The total count of currently live nodes

parameterdescription.para: Cluster & obj The object to stream

briefdescription.para: Update connectivity so that each node has at least param number of connections.

parameterdescription.para: connectivity The least connectivity to ensure

briefdescription.para: A Cluster is a collection of self-contained nodes and connections along with an associated Mesh, that can be connected up to one another.
